item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-12-18
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Follow @Selectism and RT this message by Dec 21 for a chance to win a Comme Des Garcons Shirt Peacoat #
  • RT @vegastripping ARIA Room Walkthrough #
  • I'm at Tango Mango Taqueria (1191 Centre St, Newton). #
  • Finally upgraded to Tweetie 2 for the iPhone. So far I like it, my only gripe is my retweets not showing up in my timeline. #
  • Now THIS is hilarious, and oh so true! (via @D_MacPherson) #

Powered by Twitter Tools
